attributes.action: Ban plastic McDonalds toys replace them with plant seeds or books on environment
attributes.additional_details: There is layer of micro plastic floating on the surface of our oceans, birds are feeding their chicks peices of this plastic, thinking it is food. It's our turn to help nature, we have an amazing opportunity in our generation to help clear up our planet, before there isn't one to save.
attributes.background: Millions of PLASTIC toys and their PLASTIC wrapping from McDonalds happy meals go to waste and most of them end up in non recycling bins all over the world  Why not replace them with seeds or books to help the next generation learn how to help the environment rather than pollute it further.

rejection.details:
This would a decision for McDonalds, and not the UK Government or Parliament. 

You may like to sign this petition: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/250177
